ops.description: fadeScreen({r:11, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:120}); // unused=0

ops.raw: d0 2a fc bf ff 00 00 0c fd 80 ff 00 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“Ha ha ha…
Black Materia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:10}); // {Cloud}
“Ha ha ha…
Call Meteor.”
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:3, u3:2, u4:2, aplitude:2, speed:2});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:0, u3:0, u4:1, aplitude:0, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:17}); // {Aeris}
“…It's nothing
so don't worry about it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}!!
Get a hold of yourself!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:29}); // {Aeris}
“…This must be magic.
Just what Sephiroth was saying.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:30}); // {Aeris}
“The Ultimate Destructive Magic, Meteor.”{PAUSE}“It finds small drifting planets with
its magic.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:31}); // {Aeris}
“And then collides with them.
This Planet might get wiped out entirely…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:22}); // {Barret}
“Is it some sort of a disaster?”{PAUSE}“It looks like something's gonna fall
from the sky.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:24}); // {Red XIII}
“Something's going to fall down?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // {Cid}
“What the hell is going on!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:28}); // {Cid}
“I don't know what the hell it is but
it's falling from the sky?”{PAUSE}“Hmpf! It's not even an omen.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // {Yuffie}
“{Cloud}!
What are you doing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:27}); // {Yuffie}
“I don't know what it is but…”{PAUSE}“It looks like it's going to make a mess…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}!
What's wrong with you!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:25}); // {Cait Sith}
Then, we got trouble."
“Oh, so something's going to fall from
the sky? It's going to be something big.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:26}); // {Vincent}
“Something huge is falling from the sky?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Sephiroth
“Ha ha ha…
It is not me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“…It's nothing
so don't worry about it.”

{Cloud}
“…Don't worry about it.
I understood what he was saying.”

{Barret}
“Is it some sort of a disaster?”{PAUSE}“It looks like something's gonna fall
from the sky.”

{Tifa}
“Is something going to fall from the sky?”

{Cait Sith}
Then, we got trouble."
“Oh, so something's going to fall from
the sky? It's going to be something big.”

{Vincent}
“Something huge is falling from the sky?”

{Yuffie}
“I don't know what it is but…”{PAUSE}“It looks like it's going to make a mess…”

{Cid}
“I don't know what the hell it is but
it's falling from the sky?”{PAUSE}“Hmpf! It's not even an omen.”

{Aeris}
“…This must be magic.
Just what Sephiroth was saying.”

{Aeris}
“The Ultimate Destructive Magic, Meteor.”{PAUSE}“It finds small drifting planets with
its magic.”

{Aeris}
“And then collides with them.
This Planet might get wiped out entirely…”

Sephiroth
“Ha ha ha…
It is not me.”

Sephiroth
“Ha ha ha…
You should know…”

You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

{Cait Sith}
“She told me to 'Be strong.'
I feel so happy.”

{Cait Sith}
“The Ancients went out of their
way to make this great machine.”

{Cait Sith}
“I'm saving this Planet too!
I'm a little embarrassed…”
